title: Resolve Gate Camera Failure
description: The OCR camera that reads container numbers at a gate lane fails. A technician must troubleshoot it.

tasks.description: Receive a high-priority ticket that the OCR camera at Lane 2 is not reading containers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician is assigned a ticket for the camera failure.

tasks.description: Remotely connect to the camera's diagnostic software to check its status.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician logs in and sees a 'No Network Connection' error.

tasks.description: Go to the physical location and find that the camera's network cable is unplugged. Plug it back in and verify the system is working.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician resolves the physical issue, reboots the camera, and confirms with the gate clerk that it is now working correctly.
